note.para: Additional deferral required – Auxiliary Power Unit (APU).
An auto-generated ACARS message requesting an inflight APU start should be disregarded.

placard.para: Placard APU Control Panel "APU FUEL S/O VALVE INOP" as appropriate and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Open and collar FUEL/SO VLV - APU circuit breaker (6E3).
Gain access to dry side of center tank rear spar and locate actuator.
Check that landing gear downlocks are installed (Ref. Maintenance Manual 32-00-15).

warning.para: REFER TO MAINTENANCE MANUAL 32-00-15 FOR LOCK INSTALLATION PROCEDURE. RAPID ACTION OF DOORS MAY CAUSE INJURY OR DAMAGE IF LOCKS ARE NOT PROPERLY INSTALLED.

numlitem.para: Open main gear doors and install door locks.
Remove, cap and stow electrical connector from actuator.
Lockwire manual override lever in CLOSED position.
Notify Flight Dispatch that the APU is inoperative.
